category: Member City/Provincial Sports Association Regulations/Article 39 (Operation of Committee, etc.)
contents: Article 39 (Operation of Committee, etc.) ① Any person who is disqualified as an executive under Article 30 cannot become a member of the committee under Articles 37 and 38 established by the city/provincial sports council. Revised on March 23, 2017, on February 4, 2021. ② Remuneration, salary allowances, etc. are not paid to committee members. However, the minimum expenses necessary to perform work may be paid. Revised on October 6, 2021, May 10, 2022. ③ The committee shall consist of not more than 15 members (including the chairman and vice-chairman). Revised on March 23, 2017, May 29, 2019 [Moved from Article 40 on March 23, 2017]
